trails.name: Saratoga Gap Trail
trails.conditions: Open year-round. Trail has rocky sections, some poison oak. Mostly shaded with some sun exposure. $10 parking fee.
trails.description: A popular loop trail featuring rock scrambles, ridge walks with rope-assisted sections, and beautiful mountain views. Trail varies from exposed rock terraces to shaded redwood forests. Best done counter-clockwise.

trails.name: Sawyer Camp Trail
trails.conditions: Open year-round. Paved trail, well-maintained. Popular for walking, running, and cycling.
trails.description: A scenic trail along Crystal Springs Reservoir with gentle elevation changes. Perfect for families and beginners, offering water views and wildlife spotting opportunities.

trails.name: Purisima Creek Trail
trails.location: Purisima Creek Redwoods Open Space Preserve
trails.conditions: Open year-round. Trail is well-maintained. Best hiked in cooler months.
trails.description: A challenging out-and-back trail through towering redwoods alongside Purisima Creek. Features significant elevation gain with rewarding views of the coast on clear days.
